document_data.name: Drien
document_data.mainbody: metime around the [[Shadovar invasion of Wheloon]], Drien lived as a druid at the circle of Thorngap. Unfortunately, the respected druid [[Halsaime]] became corrupted by the powers of the [[Halsaime's staff|strange staff]] that he received, becoming a destructive and malevolent force of nature. Drien was one of the druids that joined his cause, either of his own accord or the powerful will that Halsaime exerted, and guarded [[Thorn Hollow]] with [[dire bear]]s until overcome by retributive [[Harper]] agents sent from [[Eveningstar]] by [[Kirinel Zay]].
